thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Party Acting In Concert of AVIC Shenyang's Controlling Shareholder Plans To Add Shareholdings

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Party Acting In Concert of AVIC Shenyang's Controlling Shareholder Plans To Add Shareholdings

organizations.name: reuters) - avic shenyang aircraft co ltd

text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - AVIC Shenyang Aircraft Co Ltd :
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER'S PARTY ACTING IN CONCERT PLANS TO INCREASE SHAREHOLDINGS IN THE COMPANY FOR AT LEAST 100 MILLION YUAN ($15.76 million) WITHIN SIX MONTHS FROM FEB 13 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EIScQy Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3438 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
